misc_en: House of Kin Centara Ayutthaya offers a unique dining experience in the heart of Thailand's ancient capital. description_en: Experience exquisite Thai cuisine at Saneh Jaan, a Michelin-starred restaurant in Bangkok. Book through Hungry Hub for exclusive deals starting from just ฿1,500++.
misc_en: Saneh Jaan, a one Michelin-starred restaurant in Bangkok, offers an extraordinary journey through authentic Thai cuisine. Located in the Wireless Road area, this elegant establishment pays homage to traditional recipes with a contemporary twist. The restaurant's name, meaning 'beautiful moon,' reflects its commitment to presenting the finest aspects of Thai culinary heritage. Saneh Jaan's menu features meticulously crafted dishes using premium ingredients, showcasing forgotten recipes and rare delicacies. Signature dishes include Khao Chae, a refreshing rice dish served in jasmine-scented water, and Moo Sarong, pork wrapped in noodles. The restaurant's sophisticated ambiance, impeccable service, and dedication to preserving Thai culinary traditions make it a must-visit destination for food enthusiasts and connoisseurs alike.
